invalidLimit: Invalid limit, limit should be a number and greater than 0
invalidPage: Invalid page, page should be a number and greater than 0
invalidSearchKeyword: Invalid search keyword, search keyword should be a string
invalidQuantity: Invalid quantity, quantity should be a number and greater than 0
invalidPrice: Invalid price, price should be a number and greater than 0
minMaxMismatch: Min value should be less than max value
invalidPassword: password should be at least 8 characters  and contain at least one (1) letter capitalized, one (1) letter in lowercase, one (1) number and one (1) special character
passwordsNotMatched: Password and confirm password should be same
